Package curam.util.common.message

Contains base for utility classes that can handle the insertion of argument values into message strings.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CustomMessage
    An interface for custom messages.
    LocalizedMessage
    An interface that defines a message that has already been localized.
    Message
    An interface that defines the features common to all JDE-style messages.
    MessageLocalizer
    An interface for classes that can localize a message.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CatalogMessageLocalizer
    A message localizer providing safe, internationalized access to message catalog files (properties files).
    CustomMessageLocalizer
    A message localizer for custom messages.
    FallbackCatalogMessageLocalizer
    A message localizer providing safe, internationalized access to message catalog files (properties files) with the ability to fall back to a secondary catalog if a property is not found in the primary catalog, or if the primary catalog is not found.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MessageException
    Provides a mechanism for reporting errors that occur within the messaging system without relying on complex argument substitutions.

Package curam.util.common.message Description

Contains base for utility classes that can handle the insertion of argument values into message strings.
